Commentary: full ball, wide of off, tempting him into going for the cover drive, and he doesn't connect
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: too early into the shot, and a difficult chance dropped by Carlos Brathwaite at mid-off. Tamim chipped it in the air, and Brathwaite dived full stretch to his right and only got fingertips to the ball
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: strays down leg and Liton can just pick him off his pads to send the ball fine and into the fence
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: short ball outside off and bouncing high. He tries to slash but misses out. Was looking to the umpire for a wide perhaps, but that was a legal delivery
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: Fuller outside off, he comes on the front foot to tap it into the off side and run through for a quick single
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, Tamim stands in his crease and rises up to punch through cover
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: fuller length on off, Tamim defends with soft hands once again and they go through for the quick run. Cottrell tried to run down and football-kick the ball to the stumps
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: angled across him, he comes down the track to try and drive it through cover, but gets it off the end of the bat to cover
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: top edge caught easily at mid-off dug in the short one outside off, and Tamim went for the pull. Too slow on it though and he only gets a top edge that balloons to mid-off
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal c Brathwaite b Cottrell 5 (7b 0x4 0x6) SR: 71.42

Commentary: that's gone through everyone another short ball outside off, Sarkar tries to go for the pull first ball. He's too late on it, but perhaps his bat swing unsighted the keeper, and the ball goes over his head for four byes
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 4 byes

Commentary: beautiful shot a mite fuller outside off, and Soumya punches it with minimal follow through to send it racing to the point fence
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length outside off, pushed into the off side
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: another short ball does the trick Oshane's speeds today have been around 140kph mark, but this seemed like more of an effort ball. Dug in short, Liton was coming down the track, cramped him for room but he still went through with the pull. Only managed a top edge that mid-off caught for an even easier take than Tamim's
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, OUT
Dismissal_text: Liton Das c Brathwaite b Thomas 6 (5b 1x4 0x6) SR: 120.00

Commentary: full and homing in on the stumps from around the wicket, Shakib defends from the crease with a straight bat
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: thick outside edge flies to third man what is with the Bangladesh batsmen moving away and making room? Happening without much control of the shot. Shakib does that now to a fuller ball, gets a thick outside edge that flies to the third man fence
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: cracking shot that's much better timed. Moved away again, but fuller length ball and he connects well with the punch to send it through extra cover
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: moves inside the line of the ball to try and hook this back of length one on leg stump over fine leg, but misses
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: fuller ball on leg, he inside-edges his flick to square leg
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on the stumps, cut with great timing. Evin Lewis at point dives and saves the boundary, but then throws to the non-striker's end where it results in overthrows
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, 3 runs

Commentary: another short ball and another wicket Cottrell salutes in celebration and Soumya is on his way. Angling into the body from back of a length, he went for the pull. The bat turned in his hand. Another top edge results and midwicket has a straightforward catch
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar c Powell b Cottrell 5 (4b 1x4 0x6) SR: 125.00

Commentary: yorker that Shakib manages to get bat to, to dig out. Shakib was moving away from the stumps yet again, but Cottrell followed him
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: cheeky This time Shakib moved across his stumps. Back of a length on off but he gets inside the line and paddles it fine standing up, for four
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: he's back to backing away, but Cottrell follows him with another yorker length ball. Only manages to block it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: full toss, punched down the ground too full outside off, and Mushfiqur is quickly on to it, punches it through mid-off
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: shorter and outside off, but not bouncing as high. Mushfiqur cuts it nicely but third man is there so they only get a single
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: another full toss, wide of off, and Shakib frees his arms to drive this nicely through cover. The runs are coming at a nice clip for Bangladesh despite the early wickets
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: short ball, doesn't rise too much, Shakib pulls it hard, but straight to short midwicket. If he had got it slightly away from the man, might have got another boundary
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: he's certainly moving around in his crease a lot. Moves across the stumps to try and paddle it to fine leg again, but misses out
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: outside edge flies to the third man fence If he won't move across, he'll back away. Oshane kept this fuller and near off stump, Shakib threw his bat at it, got a thick edge and there's nobody to stop that
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: direct hit and he's gone pick up and throw in one motion by Rovman Powell at point, and Mushfiqur has been caught short. Good length ball, nipping into the batsman, Mushfiqur tapped it towards point and set off for quick single. There was a second's hesitation, but Shakib had responded and Mushifqur continued running through. Only a direct hit would have got him out - and Rovman hit direct in one fluid motion.
Commentary_short: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

Commentary: beamer no ball and free hit coming up. that slipped out of his hands and went head high past Shakib
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 no ball

Commentary: good ball for free hit, angling into the pads. Shakib misses the flick, and it rolls to short fine leg off the pad
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 leg bye

Commentary: back of a length on the stumps, watchfully defended
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: slower ball outside off and he misses the dab. it was the off-cutter and came back in a touch. Mahmudullah was looking run it down to third man
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: draws the edge went to drive at this fuller length ball outside off without moving his feet. Ends up with a genuine edge that flies through the vacant slips for four. Bangladesh have gotten a lot of runs in that area
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: through him, almost cuts him in half. Comes back in from back of a length and goes between bat and body to the keeper
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, tries to punch it but gets an under-edge to mid-off
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, nipping back into the right hander, who moves across and tucks this to midwicket
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: coming back in once again, but gets the line wrong that time. Pitched on off, so he is able to tuck it to deep square leg with the movement
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: strays on the pads again, and is clipped to fine leg
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: dug it in short outside off, and Mahmudullah controlled his pull well to keep it along the ground to fine leg
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: short ball took Shakib by surprise. He didn't look as if he was expecting it, was shaping to flick to leg and had to hurriedly adjust and tap it down in front of him. Still stayed in the air for a while, but dropped well short of the bowler
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: back of a length angling into the batsman, who stays in his crease and turns it to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: short ball that rises up to Shakib's head almost but he gets in good position to swivel and pull it down to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, he was coming down the track and giving himself room, but ends up slapping it without timing to extra cover
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, thrown up wide outside off. Shakib picks it and strokes it through cover for a superbly timed boundary
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: yorker into the batsman, but dug out well by Shakib. Travels straight back to the bowler, who stops it with his boot
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: back of a length angling into him, but strays in line and is picked off to deep square leg off Shakib's pads
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: good length on off and middle, he goes back to flick it to midwicket
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, steered to short third man
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: good length angling into him and ends up on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: fuller length on middle stump, bunted into the leg-side for quick single, with mid-on having to run in to field the ball
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, Shakib goes well back and flicks it to fine leg
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: fuller outside off, he comes forward and opens the face to steer it to third man
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: good length on leg stump and turning across the batsman a touch, he stays in his crease, transfers weight back and flicks to midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: flatter, angled across Shakib, who swats it to long-on
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: given some more air and fuller, pitching on middle and off, steered to point
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: given some air, very full and on middle, driven back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: gives himself room and punches this through cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: drags it down short, was the quicker one. Shakib tries to rock back and pull powerfully but only under-edges it to midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: full ball on the stumps, tapped back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: he's nicked it behind He was given out by the umpire, but his colleague at square leg has a chat with him, and they go upstairs to confirm if it carried cleanly. Seemed out and soft signal is out as well. Back of a length, off-cutter and too close to punch for Mahmudullah, who tried to force it away anyway. Ends up getting an edge to the keeper. The third umpire confirms it's out
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mahmudullah, OUT

Commentary: slanted across but too far outside off and wide
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Ariful Haque, 1 wide

Commentary: wide of off and he comes on the front foot to drive nicely past cover
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, too close to cut. Shakib looks to chop it, gets an under-edge that rolls in front. They think about a quick single but wisely decide against it
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: short ball, but slower. Shakib waits for it and pulls it gently to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: fuller length, angled across, he comes forward to push it and runs it down to third man off a thickish edge
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: good length on leg stump and spinning across the right-hander, who goes back to flick it to midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: drags it down too short and Shakib isn't going to miss out on a rank long hop. pulls it with force to the deep midwicket boundary
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: better ball, pitched on a good length and dipping on the batsman. Shakib chops it to point
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: angled into the batsman, who stays still thinking it will be a wide, but it spins back just enough to clip the pad and roll away
Commentary_short: Allen to Ariful Haque, no run

Commentary: fuller ball outside off, he opens the face to drive it past point
Commentary_short: Allen to Ariful Haque, 2 runs

Commentary: angled into the pads, and he misses the flick. They get a single with the ball rolling off the pad towards midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Ariful Haque, 1 leg bye

Commentary: too short and pulled powerfully to the deep square leg boundary. Rovman doesn't have the pace to hurry the batsman, and he was onto it quickly, going on the back foot and absolutely smoking that
Commentary_short: Powell to Ariful Haque, FOUR runs

Commentary: corrects his line and goes fuller, and the batsman comes forward to wrist it to long-on
Commentary_short: Powell to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: angled across him and beats him. Shakib went for a big drive over cover, but missed it completely
Commentary_short: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: good ball, on a perfect length where Shakib can't go back of forward and bowled on middle stump. He stays in his crease and chops it towards point off an under-edge
Commentary_short: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: too full and Shakib drives it straight back past the bowler. Long-off in place though and he cleans up
Commentary_short: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, he moves across to work it away to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Powell to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on the stumps, goes back to turn it to midwicket
Commentary_short: Thomas to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: cracked great effort from Evin Lewis, who ran to his left and dived to save a boundary at cover. Too full and Shakib rifled it past cover with great timing
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

Commentary: short ball outside off. Shakib cuts it off his toes and times it well again, but Allen at point dives and stops
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: too full and clipped off his toes to midwicket
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, strays on the pads, and he goes low to pull it down to fine leg
Commentary_short: Thomas to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: slower bouncer, and Shakib has tried to move inside the line to pull it. Goes past leg stump and he is livid at it not being given a wide. The umpire indicates it brushed his shirt
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: anther short ball, outside off that time. but bowled slower and he is beaten in his attempted cut
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, cut well but straight to point
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, no run

Commentary: back of a length just outside off, he opens the face to steer it, but finds Allen at point again
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, no run

Commentary: surprise bouncer, the batsman wasn't expecting it. Had moved on the front foot but is forced to fend the ball down
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, chopped towards cover, where Allen has gone to now and they think about a quick single but decide against it. Direct hit and Ariful was a goner at the striker's end
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, no run

Commentary: gives himself room and smashes it over cover for a pressure relieving boundary. Didn't time it all that well but hit it powerfully enough
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length bunted back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: goes to pull but gets it too high on the bat and it's swatted back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: stays back to cut it to point and they take a quick single
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: slog swept straight to deep square leg Allen had prowled the off-side in the previous over to keep Ariful from scoring. All that pressure has resulted in him trying to go in the air. connected well but hit it straight to the man at deep square leg, who didn't even have to move
Commentary_short: Allen to Ariful Haque, OUT
Dismissal_text: Ariful Haque c Pooran b Allen 17 (18b 2x4 0x6) SR: 94.44

Commentary: length ball on the pads, goes back to flick it to fine leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

Commentary: that's got air miles on it down the track, picks it up on the half-volley and frees his arms to swing it high and handsome over midwicket. Brings up his fifty as well. Shakib has held the innings together and scored briskly even while wickets have been falling
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX runs

Commentary: pulls straight to long-on short ball, he goes for the pull, the bat turns in his hands and he mis-times it horribly, goes straight to long-on. Not the smartest move to go for the glory shot, when Shakib is batting so well at the other end
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mohammad Saifuddin, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Saifuddin c Pooran b Brathwaite 1 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

Commentary: angled into the blockhole from wide of the crease, but Mehidy deals with it well, driving it to mid-on
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: good length outside off, pushed into the off side. Looking for the quick single to get Shakib on strike, but no run there
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: quicker, back of a length and cramping him for room. Wanted to cut it but too close to the body and he misses it entirely, it goes to the keeper
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: fuller ball on off, he comes across and gently turns it towards mid-on to finally get off strike
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: outside edge goes for a boundary down the track came Shakib, intending to send this ball into orbit over cow corner. Only gets an outside edge - would have been regulation for slip, but of course at this stage of the innings, there's generally no slips. Flies to the third man fence
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length outside off, pushed to point and another quick single. Another direct hit, but Shakib had made his ground comfortably. Rovman the fielder again
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball yorker, Shakib picked up nicely. Gave himself some room and lifted it over long-on for another six
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX runs

Commentary: the short ball does the trick again Cottrell banged it in, Shakib went for the pull. The bat twisted in his hand and the top edge ballooned up towards short square leg. Cottrell called loudly for it and took the catch himself. Marched and gave his salute. Bangladesh's hopes for a reasonable total depended on Shakib, you'd think they're gone now
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT
Dismissal_text: Shakib Al Hasan c & b Cottrell 61 (43b 8x4 2x6) SR: 141.86

Commentary: outside off, punched to point
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: short ball into the ribs, but Mehidy stays back and turns it down to fine leg
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: yorker, patted back to the bowler. Cottrell ends with 4 for 28, his best bowling figures in T20Is. All four wickets for him came off the short ball
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: nicely timed back of a length but too wide of off, and Mehidy cuts it past point. Third man ran around and put a despairing dive, to no avail
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

Commentary: comes down the track to heave it over cow corner but gets it off the toe end to long-on.
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: another short ball, but well directed that time, close to off stump. Pulled, but gets it high on the bat and it balloons up and lands at the vacant mid-off.
Commentary_short: Paul to Abu Hider, 1 run

Commentary: backed away to swat it to cow corner but he kept it on a good length outside off and Mehidy feathers it behind. Bangladesh lose one more
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c †Hope b Paul 8 (10b 1x4 0x6) SR: 80.00

Commentary: good length outside off, steered gently to point
Commentary_short: Paul to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

Commentary: cleaned him up He's a No.11 so you can't really expect big things from him. back of a length angling into him from round the wicket, and Mustafizur had no clue about it. Caught on the crease and tried to eventually steer it away, only got an inside edge with the ball crashing into the stumps
Commentary_short: Paul to Mustafizur Rahman, OUT

Commentary: length ball on off, and spinning into Lewis' pads. He shuffles across, and flicks to deep midwicket. West Indies off the mark
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: full on off, and tapped away off the back foot. Straight to midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and Hope clears his front leg to slog towards cow corner. Protection there though
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: flat and wide outside off, and Lewis stays on the back foot, before punching through the off side for a supreme boundary! Hammered through the infield
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball outside off, and turning inwards. Punched back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Lewis, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and going down leg. Lewis swivels to paddle sweep, and he hits it to the left of short fine leg. Keeps strike
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside off, and spinning further away. Rocks back to cut, but toe-ends the shot to point
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he shuffles across to tap the ball off his pads to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg, and slog swept right over deep midwicket! Who knew Shai Hope has the power to clear boundaries too? Down on one knee in a flash, and absolutely clattering this towards the leg side
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: full on leg, and spinning into his pads. Tries to slog sweep again, but the ball hits his front leg, then hits the back of his bat, and finally runs away past the keeper's left for four more! Frustrating for Miraz
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 4 leg byes

Commentary: half-tracker on off, and Hope parks his legs behind the popping crease. Swivels in a flash, and then pulls this right over deep backward square! Exquisite footwork
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: into the stands! Full on middle, and he waits for the ball to get to him, before swinging across the line once more. Off the bat's sweet spot, and Miraz has conceded 23
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: full on off, and angling into his legs. Nudged off his pads to deep backward square once again
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: good length on off, and he bends his knees to pull. Mistimed to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off stump. But Hope has come skipping down the ground, and he flat-bats a drive right over extra cover
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: full on off stump, and he drills a straight drive to mid off
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Hope, no run

Commentary: good length outside off stump, and he plays this length-ball off the front foot. Drives with the straight bat, and the shot beats the sliding mid-off fielder! Hope on 29 off nine balls
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on middle, and Lewis is done playing second fiddle! Clears the front leg, gets his bat under the ball, and then absolutely smashes this slower ball over deep midwicket. Fifty up!
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: in the air, and taken at wide long on! Short from Saifuddin, Lewis tries to pull, and that's been sliced to the the fielder in the deep. Saifuddin gives Lewis a send off, but the batsman chooses to smile it off
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, OUT
Dismissal_text: E Lewis c Ariful Haque b Mohammad Saifuddin 18 (11b 1x4 1x6) SR: 163.63

Commentary: full on leg, and clipped off his toes to deep midwicket. Inswinger from Saif this time
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: full outside leg stump, and going down leg. Given as a wide
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, 1 wide

Commentary: length ball on leg stump, and uncomfortably punched to mid off
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle, and hammered over mid on! Stays on the back foot, and lifts it over the infield. Remember this is still just the 4th over!
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: attempted yorker that finishes up as a low full toss. Sliced away behind square as the keeper goes for a chase
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg, but Pooran backs away to display all three stumps, and mistimes a slog teasingly over mid on!
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: full just outside off, and driven through the covers! This was elegant for a change. Conventional cover drive that beats cover, and then the diving mid-off fielder as well
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on off, and flicked off his pads to Hider at midwicket
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: sliced but lands just beyond mid off again! Full on middle, and Hope tried to clear the leg side. Bat turned in his hand, and therefore went towards the off side instead. Eventually, pretty safe given that we're still in the Powerplay
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: good length just outside off, and fended off the back foot towards the off side. Enough time to pinch a single
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: using the bat like a katana! It's an almost perfect yorker outside the stumps from Fizz, but Hope simply opens the bat's face and steers a square drive behind point for four! Excellent batsmanship
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on off, and spinning away from Pooran. He backs away to lift it over extra cover, but eventually toe-ends the shot to long off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: low full toss on off stump, and he clears his front leg to deposit a straight drive over long on! Juicy delivery, and given the treatment it deserved
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: full outside off stump, and he uses his wrists to muscle a cover drive over the infield! Oozing class
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: overpitched on off stump, and defended to mid off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

Commentary: that's a 16-ball half-century for Shai Hope! The Windies applaud from the dug out. Half-tracker on off that's turning inwards, and Hope goes towards the leg side before slogging right over cow corner. What an innings!
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball outside off, and he flat-bats a pull to wide long on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, and defended off the back foot to cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

Commentary: stays low! Full on middle stump, and the ball goes through his legs. Mushi does well to take the ball real low
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

Commentary: good length outside off, and defended away to cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: good length on middle, and flicked away to the leg side
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, and flat-batted to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle stump, and he gets down on one knee, before paddling a shot fine past the fielder at short fine leg
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 2 runs

Commentary: full on middle, and reverse swept to short third man
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, no run

Commentary: good length outside off, and he backs away to cut. To Liton at deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off, and that's been struck straight to the fielder at deep extra cover! Not off the bat's sweet spot, and easily done by Fizz near the boundary. A strike-rate of almost 240 for Hope.
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Hope, OUT
Dismissal_text: SD Hope c Mustafizur Rahman b Mahmudullah 55 (23b 3x4 6x6) SR: 239.13

Commentary: full on off, and tapped away to square leg. Gets off the mark
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Paul, 1 run

Commentary: full just outside off, and steered to point. Pooran says no to the run
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he clears the front leg to slog. Mistimed to midwicket.100 for West Indies in just 49 legal balls!
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside off, and he backs away to cut square. Protection in the deep
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle, and Paul walks down the wicket to drive to long on. Gives the strike back to NP
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle, and sliding across the left-handed Pooran. Tried to fend, but the ball went into the keeper's gloves
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and he muscles a straight drive past the non-striker to long off
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: good length just outside off, and cut off the back foot for more runs. Deep extra cover doing the clean up this time
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide again from Mahmudullah. Cut with the flat-bat to deep point for a run
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Paul, 1 run

Commentary: full just outside off, and defended towards cover for a quick single. Lbw appeal from Mahmudullah but not given. They consider reviewing, but they don't.
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: good length on middle, and fended off the back foot to the off side
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Paul, no run

Commentary: lower-arm delivery from Mahmudullah. Paul looks to play a deft late cut, but straight to short third man
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Paul, no run

Commentary: good length outside off stump, but this in Keemo Paul's arc! Backs away, rocks back, and then absolutely hammers a slogged shot over the long-on boundary
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Paul, SIX runs

Commentary: tossed up on middle, and Paul runs down the wicket. Hits the low full toss to cover
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Paul, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on off stump, and turning away from Paul. Tapped away to point
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and Paul skips down the ground and then absolutely golf-swings a shot over Shakib's head! With disdain, and in total control. Ninety-six metres, would ya believe it
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, SIX runs

Commentary: full outside leg stump, but Paul backs away - exposing all three stumps - and then slogs over cow corner for half-a-dozen more! Plays the shot from near the end of the pitch. That's how wide he went to play the shot
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, SIX runs

Commentary: full on off, and turning away from Paul. Looks to drag a shot behind square on the leg side, but the toe-ended shot takes it to deep midwicket instead. Beats wide long on and the scores are now tied
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on leg, and tapped away to the leg side. West Indies win by eight wickets and 55 balls to spare!
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 leg bye
